finetuned.compose 1: Move the phones from the desk to the bed at any time. Simultaneously, put a geometry book on the bed.
finetuned.compose 2: Put a geometry book on the bed. After putting the book on the bed, move the phones from the desk to the bed.
finetuned.compose 3: Move the phones from the desk to the bed. Simultaneously, put a geometry book on the bed.

finetuned.compose 3: Put a closed laptop on the desk at any time. After putting the laptop, get the phone from the shelf and put it on the bed.
